metadata.description: Secure your account with two-factor verification.
metadata.title: Two-Factor Verification

header.title: Two-Factor Verification
header.description: Please verify your identity using one of the methods below.

totp.title: Authenticator app
totp.description: Enter a code from your authenticator app.

otp.title: Email verification code
otp.description: Enter the code sent to your email address.

backup.title: Backup code
backup.description: Use one of your backup codes to continue.
